Text:
What if Seinfeld were not so much a show about “nothing,” and actually a show about the opposite of nothing, i.e. life and death?

In this very funny fan-made video, the most macabre of George’s storylines—the untimely but kind of fortuitous demise of his fiancée Susan—gets recut into a parody trailer for a very serious made-for-TV drama, complete with swelling music and lingering stares at the camera. You’ll laugh; you’ll cry; you’ll never lick an envelope again.
